Have the below miscuts available - was going to start collecting miscuts but want to get my last 2 T206 Cobbs so a few need to go to help with the Cobb purchase. ALL PRICES INCLUDE DELIVERY



Crandall  sold
Howell    $32 piedmont 350 back 
Thomas    $35 piedmont 350 back very nice example

or take remaning 2 for $62

cant get these 2 to load on photobucket can email me for scans on these if interested

Sweeney miscut front 2 full name & team designations $85
Mitchell SGC 40 miscut back full & a partial piedmont reverse $75
